ok ladies and gentleman figured out how to get english audio/subs.

-download the english fix right under this torrent.
-put contents of fc3_main_english in fc3_main subfolder (in worlds folder)
-put contents of sound_english in data_win32
-delete the two sound_russian files and the two fc3_main_russian files in the aforementioned folders
-change language and or subs in game menu

For the audio and subtitles, follow these steps.

1. Download this file it is the english fix. http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7866087/Far_Cry_3_English_Fix.7z

2. When it is done extract it, where ever you want.

Let's start with subtitles.

3. When extracted hit the folder, it just made.

4. Open the fc3_main_english and copy them.

5. Go into C:Program Files (x86)Far Cry 3data_win32worldsfc3_main.

6. Delete the Fc3_main_russia.dat and fat.

7. the Fc3_main_english_fat you just copied, but them in here instead.

The audio.

8. Go back into the folder you just extracted.

9. Click on the sound_english. not the (fc3_main_english)

10. Go into C:Program Files (x86)Far Cry 3data_win32

11. The dat and fat files you just copied, put them into this folder.

12. Delete the Russia Sound_Russia.dat and fat.

Right guys, this works fine tho takes a bit of work.

Runs great on 2 year old HD 5850@1080p almost all settings maxed.

1st thing is to install this and then do the uplay cracking which works fine if you actually read the readme.

Next is download and install the English Audio fix, 465MB one.  DO NOT delete any other files in game folder, just copy english files into correct folders.

To get English to work ingame you have to edit the gamerprofile.xml found in My docs/My games/Far cry 3.  Change language from russian to English then save and exit.

Theres also a reg edit for language change you MIGHT need but mine was already set to English, i didnt have to change anything but others might, changing: local machine/software/ubisoft/far cry 3 - Language to "English and SKU to ENG
